## ProductPrices.regularPrice property

> Warning: This API is now obsolete.
> 
> Use regular\_price from PriceRange.minimum\_price or PriceRange.maximum\_price.
> 

The base price of a product.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
regularPrice?: Maybe<Price>;
```
